content: to last 3 sts ssk k1 row 2 ws k to 1 st before maker ktbl slm k1 slm work row 1 and 2 a total of fifteen times ktbl k to end cut c19 work row 1 and 2 a total of fifteen times section 20 note if this is your last mini do not cut join c20 your yarn continue to the bind-off section otherwise cut c21 and continue to row 1 rs k1 k2tog k to marker yo slm k1 slm section 22 yo k to last 3 sts ssk k1 row 2 ws k to 1 st before maker ktbl slm k1 section 22 slm ktbl k to end join c22 row 3 k1 k2tog k1 p2 to 1 st before marker k1 row 1 rs k1 k2tog k to marker yo slm k1 slm yo slm k1 slm yo k1 p2 k1 to last 3 sts ssk k1 yo k to last 3 sts ssk k1 row 4 k2 p1 k2 to 2 sts before marker p1 ptbl row 2 ws k to 1 st before maker ktbl slm k1 slm p1 slm ptbl p1 k2 p1 to last 2 sts k2 slm ktbl k to end row 5 k1 k2tog k to marker yo slm k1 slm yo k row 3 k1 k2tog k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo to 5 to last 3 sts ssk k1 sts before marker k3 yo k2tog yo slm k1 slm yo row 6 k2 p to 1 sts before marker ptbl slm p1 k2tog yo k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 to last 3 slm ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 sts ssk k1 row 4 k2 p to 1 st before marker ptbl slm p1 slm row 7 k1 k2tog p1 k1 p2 to marker yo slm k1 ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 slm yo p2 k1 to last 4 sts p1 ssk k1 row 8 k3 p1 k2 to 1 st before marker ptbl slm row 5 k1 k1 k2tog k to marker yo slm k1 slm p1 slm ptbl k2 p1 to last 3 sts k3 yo k to last 3 sts ssk k1 row 6 k2 p to 1 st before marker ptbl slm p1 slm row 9-10 repeat row 5 and 6 ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 9 www shopfactorygirl com let s shawl together row 7 k1 k2tog k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo to 4 sts section 23 before marker k4 yo slm k1 slm yo k4 yo sl1 join c23 k2tog psso yo k3 to last 3 sts ssk k1 row 8 k2 p to 1 st before marker ptbl slm p1 slm row 1 rs k1 k2tog k to marker yo slm k1 slm ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 yo k to last 3 sts ssk k1 row 2 ws k to 1 st before maker ktbl slm k1 slm row 9-10 repeat row 5-6 ktbl k to end row
